title: LOL REPLAY 2
body: I have used this program in the past to be specific when version 2.6 came out i stopped using it and i have re downloaded the program and now i am trying to adjust my camera angle for cool effects and just to see the battle up close and i cant is this a new patch.

replies.body: I don't know much about LoL Replay 2 because it's not actually an official Riot program. Since we didn't make it, I don't really have the tools or ability to troubleshoot any of it, but a quick [**google search pulled this up**](http://www.leaguereplays.com/forum/)!
